name: Restaurants and Cafes
description: Establishments that prepare and serve food and beverages to customers.

name: Retail and Shopping
description: Businesses that sell goods directly to consumers.

name: Health and Wellness
description: Organizations that provide health-related services, including clinics, gyms, and spas.

name: Arts and Entertainment
description: Venues and entities promoting arts, movies, music, and other forms of entertainment.

name: Professional Services
description: Businesses offering specialized services such as law, accounting, and consultancy.

name: Construction and Real Estate
description: Companies involved in building infrastructure and those dealing in properties.

name: Education and Training
description: Institutions and platforms offering educational courses, training, and resources.

name: Travel and Tourism
description: Agencies, accommodations, and attractions catering to travelers and tourists.

name: Technology and Software
description: Businesses involved in creating tech solutions, software products, and related services.

name: Automotive
description: Companies related to the design, manufacturing, and selling of motor vehicles.

name: Fashion
description: Modern wear for men and women
